channel.title: Brain-Computer Interfaces on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Neuralink’s Bid to Trademark ‘Telepathy’ and ‘Telekinesis’ Faces Legal Issues
item.description: The brain implant company cofounded by Elon Musk filed to trademark the product names Telepathy and Telekinesis. But it turns out that another person had already filed to trademark those names.

item.title: Neuralink’s Bid to Trademark ‘Telepathy’ and ‘Telekinesis’ Faces Legal Issues
item.description: The brain implant company cofounded by Elon Musk filed to trademark the product names Telepathy and Telekinesis. But it turns out that another person had already filed to trademark those names.

item.title: China Is Building a Brain-Computer Interface Industry
item.description: A new policy document outlines China’s plan to create an internationally competitive BCI industry within five years, and proposes developing devices for both health and consumer uses.

item.title: China Is Building a Brain-Computer Interface Industry

item.title: Join Our Next Livestream: Inside Katie Drummond’s Viral Interview With Bryan Johnson
item.description: On July 31, WIRED’s global editorial director discusses the world of wellness—and beyond—with WIRED reporters.

item.title: The Very Real Case for Brain-Computer Implants
item.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, we dive into the heated race between two companies to build a commercial brain-computer interface.
